documentclassifier
Class PreferencesDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      documentclassifier.PreferencesDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PreferencesDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

This class represents the JDialog used to modify the program's preferences, such as - The scraper used to extract the features (terms) from documents. - The metric used to calculate the distance between documents. - Etc...

Author:
Salvo Danilo Giuffrida (salvod.giuffrida@gmail.com)
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PreferencesDialog

protected PreferencesDialog(org.jdesktop.application.FrameView parent,
                            boolean modal)
Constructor that creates a new PreferencesDialog.

Parameters:
parent - The frame father of this JDialog.
modal - A boolean indicating if the JDialog should be modal or not.
Method Detail

cancel

@Action
public void cancel()
This action is called each time that the user presses the button 'Cancel' in the GUI. Its only task is to close the JDialog.

OK

@Action
public void OK()
This action is called each time that the user presses the button 'OK'. Its task is to update the values of the preferences, corresponding to those GUI's components whose value or state has been modified by the user.

reset

@Action
public void reset()
Action to reset all the preferences to their default value.
